text:
Maru Sakhesh is a [[cleric]] of the [[Church of the Wyrm Ascendant]] and high priest of the [[Temple of the Sovereign Host]] in [[Stormreach]]. He is tall and heavyset, a man used to good food and easy living; he often wears a robe of black silk with a golden cowl, and colorful dragons dance along the hem.

Sakhesh is a cruel but charismatic man, and he has brought a considerable fortune to the temple coffers during his tenure. He was killed by a band of adventurers looking to loot the temple in 997 YK, but the [[Jorasco]] healers were able to [[raise him from the dead|raise dead]]; since that incident, he tends
to be somewhat suspicious of wanderers.
